name: Lost in time (itch) (gamepanter)
description:
This game is made for the brackeys gamejam 9.

Theme: An end is a beginning.

(DISCLAIMER: DUE TO DEADLINE STRESS, THERE IS NO QUIT GAME IN-GAME! JUST USE ALT+F4)

In this simple platformer, time is lost and reality is shifted! You need to find the hands of the clock to fix it!

features

  • Platformer
  • 5 levels
  • Unique machanics

Credits:

  • Gamepanter - made the game
  • Switch - made the background music
